properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras Blancas 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 14 at 1:42PM PST until January 16 at 9:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and seas 9 to 11 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 20
kt with gusts up to 25 kt.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras Blancas 10-
60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 AM to 9 AM PST Thursday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM PST THURSDAY
